product_name: Pearl Izumi ELITE In-R-Cool Tri Shorts - Men's
long_description: The Pearl Izumi ELITE In-R-Cool(R) tri shorts combine exceptional cooling and sun protection with a design made to perform from training to the finish line. Stay cool in direct sunlight thanks to a reflective fabric surface which doesn't heat up as readily as standard performance fabric. Moisture-wicking fabric blend offers light compression. Fabric protects skin from damaging sunlight with a UPF rating of 50+. Silicone grippers help shorts stay in place. Quick-drying chamois pad boosts your comfort in the saddle and features active carbon yarns to help reduce odors. Wide waistband with a flat, stretchy drawcord for a comfortable fit. Single rear envelope pocket stores small essentials. The Pearl Izumi ELITE In-R-Cool(R) tri shorts are formfitting.
